verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: has] shown both her happy and indifferent faces to the scrum of White House photographers whose shutter - clicks are the first family 's inescapable soundtrack .

[ARG0: Melania Trump] has [V: shown] [ARG1: both her happy and indifferent faces] [ARG2: to the scrum of White House photographers whose shutter - clicks are the first family 's inescapable soundtrack] .
Melania Trump has shown both her happy and indifferent faces to the scrum of White House photographers [ARG1: whose shutter - clicks] [V: are] [ARG2: the first family 's inescapable soundtrack] .
